name: Reef's Thief's Problem
description:
Instructions:

choose items and options to survive the thieves!

Press 1 to hide the achievements

press 2 to hide the endings

press 3 to hide cash

press a to show achievements

press b to show the cash

press c to show the endings

Notes and Credits: 

inspired henry stickmen games!

check out my youtube channel Brosilverlee3 for future updates and installments!
